channel.title: How can I make a PK box in varrock?
channel.description:
Hey, How can i make a piece wildernis in varrock? and how can i put there wildernis signs?
thanxx

item.title: How can I make a PK box in varrock?
item.dc:creator: @pk3zoi pk3zoi
item.description:
@pk3zoi wrote:

ok, do you know how to make nonwild areas? I really hope so. If you do, you have to first search for something like

|| (absX >= 2499 && absX <= 2545 && absY >= 4622 && absY <= 4668) Copy and paste that whole section, and enter it back so it looks like it fits, with, of course your own coordinates. The coordinates must go from smallest to largest, the first absX be your smallest X coor, and your second be the largest, same with absY. If you didnt understand that search for some tutorials.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make a PK box in varrock?
